mapper.select: SELECT *,'' as author FROM eqpt_inrepository UNION SELECT * FROM eqpt_inrepository_draft WHERE author = #{author} ORDER BY inId DESC
SELECT * FROM eqpt_inrepository_draft ORDER BY inId DESC
SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT inId FROM eqpt_inrepository WHERE inId = #{inId}
SELECT outId FROM eqpt_outrepository WHERE outId = #{outId}
SELECT inId FROM eqpt_inrepository WHERE inId LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{inId},'%')) UNION SELECT inId FROM eqpt_inrepository_draft WHERE inId LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{inId},'%')) ORDER BY inId
mapper.update: UPDATE eqpt_inrepository SET INST_ID_ = #{instid} WHERE INST_ID_ = ''

UPDATE eqpt_inrepository
secondOne = #{arg1},
thirdOne = #{arg2},
fourthOne = #{arg3},
WHERE INST_ID_ = #{arg0}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT F_WDBH AS inId FROM w_cgddhtpsd WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT inInfo FROM eqpt_inrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT DISTINCT F_WDBH AS inId FROM w_jy WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT inInfo FROM eqpt_inrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END'

SELECT DISTINCT w_cgmx7.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_cgmx7.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cgmx7.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cgmx7.F_CGSL AS inNum,w_jy.F_WDBH AS 'check',w_jy.F_XLH AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cgmx7,w_jy WHERE w_cgmx7.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_cgddhtpsd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_cgmx7.F_WLBM AND w_jy.F_WLBM = eqpt_material.id UNION SELECT DISTINCT w_cgmx7.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_cgmx7.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cgmx7.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cgmx7.F_CGSL AS inNum,'' AS 'check','' AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cgmx7 WHERE w_cgmx7.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_cgddhtpsd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_cgmx7.F_WLBM AND eqpt_material.id = ANY(SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE eqpt_material.id not in (SELECT F_WLBM FROM w_jy)) UNION SELECT DISTINCT w_jy.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_jy.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_jy.F_GGXH AS spec,w_jy.F_JYSL AS inNum,w_jy.F_WDBH AS 'check',w_jy.F_XLH AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_jylymx,w_jy WHERE w_jy.ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_jy WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_jy.F_WLBM AND w_jy.F_WLBM = eqpt_material.id UNION SELECT DISTINCT w_jy.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_jy.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_jy.F_GGXH AS spec,w_jy.F_JYSL AS inNum,'' AS 'check','' AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_jylymx,w_jy WHERE w_jy.ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_jy WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_jy.F_WLBM AND eqpt_material.id = ANY(SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE eqpt_material.id not in (SELECT F_WLBM FROM w_jy)) ORDER BY materialId
SELECT w_cgddhtpsd.F_XMBH AS projId,w_cgddhtpsd.F_XMMC AS projName FROM w_cgddhtpsd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh}
SELECT TASK_DEF_KEY_ FROM act_ru_task WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = #{taskid}
SELECT * FROM eqpt_inrepository WHERE INST_ID_ = #{instId} ORDER BY inId DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT author FROM eqpt_inrepository_draft WHERE materialId = #{materialId} AND inId = #{inId}
SELECT * FROM eqpt_inrepository_draft WHERE inId LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{inId},'%'))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM eqpt_inrepository_draft WHERE inId LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{inId},'%'))
mapper.select: SELECT '业务采购订单合同评审单' AS F_BDMC, F_WDBH, F_SQR_NAME, F_TXRQ, F_XMBH, F_XMMC FROM w_cgddhtpsd WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT inInfo FROM eqpt_inrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT '检验单' AS F_BDMC, F_WDBH, F_SQR_NAME, F_TXRQ, '' as F_XMBH, '' as F_XMMC FROM w_jy WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT inInfo FROM eqpt_inrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END'

SELECT F_WLBM AS id, F_WLMC AS name, F_GGXH AS spec, F_CGSL AS num, F_CGDJ AS price, F_CGJE AS sum FROM w_cgmx7,w_cgddhtpsd WHERE w_cgmx7.REF_ID_ = (SELECT ID_ FROM w_cgddhtpsd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh}) AND w_cgddhtpsd.INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT F_WLBM AS id, F_WLMC AS name, F_GGXH AS spec, F_JYSL AS num, '' AS price, '' AS sum FROM w_jylymx,w_jy WHERE w_jylymx.REF_ID_ = (SELECT ID_ FROM w_jy WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh}) AND w_jy.INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END'

SELECT '业务采购订单合同评审单' AS firstOne, F_WDBH AS secondOne, F_SQR_NAME AS thirdOne, F_TXRQ AS fourthOne, F_XMBH AS bn, F_XMMC AS sn FROM w_cgddhtpsd WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT inInfo FROM eqpt_inrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT '检验单' AS firstOne, F_WDBH AS secondOne, F_SQR_NAME AS thirdOne, F_TXRQ AS fourthOne, '' AS bn, '' AS sn FROM w_jy WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT inInfo FROM eqpt_inrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END'
